products.name: Bucktown Modular 3-Piece Sectional Sofa
products.content: Nam nec tellus a odio tincidunt auctor a ornare odio. Sed non mauris vitae erat consequat auctor eu in elit. Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra.

products.name: Yukon 80Black Live Edge Wood Dining Table
products.content: Updated with a black finish for a sleek silhouette, our best-selling Yukon dining table revels in the fascinating knots, splits and distinct grain patterns unique to natural acacia wood. Made with a blend of modern machinery and traditional hand craftsmanship, the table features planks of live-edge acacia wood tinted black and braced with the form-meets-function accent of expertly fashioned butterfly joints

products.name: Eastham 90''-118'' Brushed Charcoal Oak Wood Extendable Dining Table
products.content: Farmhouse casual meets Prairie School geometry in our Eastham dining table. Channeling French country design, this modern update traces a linear trestle base and a generously sized top with breadboard leaves that pull out to expand seating from 6 to 10.

products.name: Willy Charcoal Brown Pedestal Bistro Table by Leanne Ford
products.content: Willy distills the classic pedestal table down to its striking essentials in chic charcoal. The bistro table's bold conical pedestal and simple round top are made from concrete material that creates a plaster-like appearance but is lighter in weight and more easily fabricated into this dramatically simple shape. Bistro-scaled to seat two, the grey table is a Crate & Barrel exclusive

products.name: nyo 84'' White Pine Wood Extendable Dining Table
products.content: Inspired by minimalist architecture and the shifting perspectives of Modern art, our Inyo table enhances the dining room with artful geometry. The table plays with space, shaping right-angled legs, recessed aprons and a top with cut-out corners.

products.name: Monarch Shiitake 108'' Dining Table
products.content: Our Monarch dining collection is handcrafted using centuries-old techniques in a modern way. Rare lengths of solid walnut chosen for their beautiful cathedral graining, are united on top with traditional wood-on-wood butterfly joinery without using nails or screws.

products.name: Mickell Storage Console Table
products.content: We've tapped into the clean lines and natural warmth of Scandinavian design to bring you our Mickell console table. Made of sustainably sourced ash with an oak veneer top and drawer fronts , the table has a smart, black finish to emphasize its modern silhouette

products.name: Revival Oak Wood Console Table by Athena Calderone
products.content: Refresh your living room, office or entryway decor with the eye-catching asymmetry of our Revival console table. Based on a 1950s side table that Athena Calderone rescued from the trash and restored, the Revival table features a freeform top of travertine reined in by flat edges and slightly eased corners. Post-shaped legs of solid oak support in an off-kilter arrangement, finished in ivory ceruse and accented with carved rimmed detail.

products.name: Pace Oak Wood Storage Console Table
products.content: Named for the Italian word for 'peace,' our Pace console table soothes your surroundings with a beautiful blend of natural oak and warm copper. The table's waterfall design softens with gently curved bullnose edges to frame two seamless drawers wrapped in gorgeous copper sheeting with an antique patina finish.

products.name: Turmont Glass Console Table
products.content: Dense and light, clear and opaque, our Turmont console table balances opposites in a striking design. Blocky legs stand close in pairs as they rise tall, intersecting with a slab of precisely cast glass for a checkered top of graphic contrast.

products.name: Dillon Spalted Primavera Round Wood Coffee Table
products.content: Prized for its high-contrast colors and swirling grain, spalted wood is timber that has undergone a certain degree of decay to develop these striking characteristics. The Dillon coffee table puts this organic showstopper on full display in a handcrafted cylinder floating on a recessed base of oxidized iron. Each table will exhibit its own unique markings.

products.name: Penn Bluestone 5'' Pedestal Base Dining Table
products.content: Recast for contemporary dining rooms, the Penn dining table mixes up materials for a natural take on the classic tulip table. A stunning tabletop of bluestone balances on a flared pedestal base made of cast iron with a deep black finish that adds industrial edge. The round pedestal table seats six.

products.name: Malin 78'' Oval Natural Oak Wood Dining Table
products.content: Unexpected angles and a racetrack oval shape put a Crate & Barrel spin on Scandinavian Modern in our Malin table. Made of solid ash and oak veneer, the dining table showcases slender, tapered legs with turned stretchers set at opposing angles that add interest as well as legroom. Bullnose edging adds to the table's detail-rich styling

products.name: Clairemont 4'' Oval Natural Oak Wood Coffee Table with Shelf
products.content: We've translated the refined elegance and Art Deco roots of our popular Clairemont into beautifully grained oak. The table's elongated oval profile, airy two-tiered design and clean tapered lines are perfect for showcasing the oak's dramatic cathedral graining, brought to full expression with wirebrushing and an ivory ceruse finish. The Clairemont oval wood coffee table is a Crate & Barrel exclusive.

products.name: Damen 48'' White Travertine Marble Top Dining Table
products.content: Sophisticated materials engage in modern geometry to shape this elegant dining table. Black-finished iron curves the open pedestal base that supports a round top of white travertine marble, actually a type of limestone that's celebrated for its marble-like patterning and warm earth tones that are unique to each piece.

products.name: Hayes 60'' Round Acacia Dining Table
products.content: Hayes' open fretwork of angled brass tubing finds its perfect complement in a round tabletop crafted of solid acacia planks that are expertly joined and shaped to showcase the beautiful grain. This dining table's mixed materials expand upon the trend with an elevated design that feels fresh and modern in any setting.

products.name: Twist Whitewashed Ash Wood Rotating Desk
products.content: Our amazingly versatile Twist desk pivots on a round hub to serve a variety of functions. In its compact form, the table surfaces nest to create an office desk. Expanded, they part to become an expansive executive desk or angle as a corner desk. In fact, the desk rotates a full 360 degrees, creating any number of configurations to suit your space.

products.name: Pilsen Graphite L-Shaped Desk with Glass Top
products.content: Defined by its industrial mix of glass and steel with modern angles, Pilsen is an architectural collection with an urban edge at a smart value. This space-saving design by Mark Daniel combines two units, floating glass desktops over minimalist yet durable frames of rectangular iron tubing in sleek grey powdercoat.

products.name: Alexander Walnut Wood Side Table by Jake Arnold
products.content: A bit petite and just a tad formal, our Alexander side table makes a big impact paired with a sofa or armchair. With a nod to the classic curves of traditional saber legs, the tripod legs rise tall and slim to anchor the table's pronounced apron and round top. The sculptural silhouette accentuates the dynamic grain of solid walnut and walnut veneer, brought into focus with a warm walnut finish.

products.name: Pilsen Salt Desk
products.content: Defined by its industrial mix of glass and steel with modern angles, Pilsen is our urban-inflected architectural collection at a smart value. This desk's glass surface floats over a minimalist frame of rectangular iron tubing finished in high-gloss white.

products.name: Waylon Executive 70'' Grey Oak Desk
products.content: Our statuesque Waylon executive desk takes charge with strong, architectural lines and exuberant graining. Inspired by monolithic forms, the bold waterfall design takes its cue from fluted columns with carved linear detailing that conceals three drawers on both ends that are seamlessly integrated into the design.

products.name: Lighting: Modern Chandeliers
Oxford Black Small Storage Desk
products.content: The urban sophistication of Art Deco lives on in Oxford, a furniture collection destined to command attention. Defined by clean lines and material contrast, this writing desk traces each angle with room-defining geometry.

products.name: Tate 48'' Stone Grey Wood Desk with Outlet
products.content: Our 1960s-inspired Tate desk recalls the timelessness of mid-century design with a tailored profile and streamlined shape. Crafted with stone-tinted ash veneer, the desk showcases three drawers united by linear undercut drawer pulls that run the length of the desk.

products.name: La Strana Concrete Tripod Side Table by Athena Calderone
products.content: Based on a quirky piece picked up at an estate sale, this unusually shaped table invites curiosity and makes the eye linger. Connecting a cone with a tripod base of bowed legs, the offbeat side table is made of a plaster-like material that's hand-textured and finished in matte white.

products.name: Kota Square Textured Black Pine Side Table
products.content: Majestic and modern, our Kota side table takes its inspiration from the bold and expressive style of Brutalist sculpture. Made of pine with a black finish, the table intersects a cross base with a trapezoidal prism top in a dramatic union of strong geometric shapes.

products.name: Sassolino Burl Wood Nesting Side Tables by Athena Calderone, Set of 2
products.content: Our two nesting Sassolino tables by Athena Calderone look to nature for their striking contemporary-meets-organic vibe. Textured to resemble stone, the concrete tops take their shapes directly from puddles and wave-sculpted rocks the designer spied at the seashore. The coffee table's top is secured by three oval legs while the side table's top rests on a bold pedestal, all clad in mappa burl veneer that is prized for its naturally occurring wood grain swirls.

products.name: Arno Black Wood Side Chair
products.content: Arno's easy charm lies in its subtle design details. The slightest curve to the chair's slat back provides back support, while the sculpted seat ensures a comfortable sit. Tapered legs splay to give a sense of movement, and eased edges soften all the angles.

products.name: Paolo Black Wood Dining Chair
products.content: ur Paolo dining chair curves a classic paddle-back design inspired by mid-century modern icons. Faced in textured white oak veneer, the contoured seat and back encourage comfortable lingering over leisurely brunches and laid-back dinners. The ebonized finish brings a touch of drama to the sculptural-yet-casual silhouette

products.name: Malin Whitewash Ash Wood Dining Chair
products.content: Malin reimagines the classic modern wishbone chair with graceful curves and attention to comfort. Made of solid ash, the dining chair takes a refined stance on tapered legs with a rounded back centered by a clean-lined splat for a supportive stay. The seat is inset with a cushion covered in a natural flecked wool-blend fabric that perfectly complements the chair's whitewashed oatmeal finish.

products.name: Lowe Charcoal Upholstered Dining Chair
products.content: With a roomy cushioned seat and back, our Lowe dining chair is designed for tableside lingering. Linen-blend upholstery in chic charcoal tailors the cushioned, tight seat in sophistication, partnering perfectly with slim, natural-toned hardwood legs

products.name: Lowe Smoke Leather Dining Chair
products.content: Stylish and contemporary Lowe wraps the classic Parsons-style chair in pure color, with a wide range of hues in pebbled, bicast leather. With a roomy cushioned seat and back, it's designed for lingering.

products.name: Mazz Boucle Dining Chair by Leanne Ford
products.content: Our Mazz dining chair puts comfort and cool factor into contemporary design. Playful proportions take shape in the ultra-slim wood legs and oversized, tubular cushion that flows seamlessly from arm to back. Designed for comfort as well as eye-popping good looks, the chair relaxes with a generous, well-cushioned seat and luxe bouclé upholstery.

products.name: Broome Upholstered Olive Green Dining Chair by Jake Arnold
products.content: Settle into the cushioned charms of Broome. Inspired by a vintage armchair, the dining chair floats a well-padded seat between two arched arms that recall the classic tailoring of English roll arms with their pleated detail. The button-tufted back curves gently to provide a supportive seat. Velvet upholstery in versatile olive green adds a soft touch.

products.name: Cavett Ash Wood Leather Accent Chair
products.content: Relax back to another modern time. Cavett's mid-century modern lines capture the best of 1950s design in solid ash and rich leather. Dramatic streamlined arms, cantilevered seat and vertical slat back attract the eye from every angle. A sleek choice for smaller living rooms and family rooms, Cavett's slight recline angles you back comfortably with supportive cushions upholstered in lustrous full-grain, full-aniline-dyed leather

products.name: Powell White Fabric Wingback Lounge Accent Chair
products.content: Danish design and mid-century inspiration come together in our striking Powell swivel chair. One continuous line flows to create the rounded armrests and exaggerated wingback for an expressive update on a classic style. Birch legs splay an angled swivel base that compliments the linen-look upholstery with a warm walnut finish.

products.name: Kids Sherpa Bear Chair
products.content: Ultra-cozy and perfectly sized for little ones, our supersoft sherpa bear chair brings whimsy and charm to any setting. The playful bear silhouette features rounded ears and a curved back that gives kids a comfy place to curl up. Rich, honey-toned oak legs add support and style.

products.name: Ripple Black Leather Office Chair with Chrome Base.
products.content: Our industrious Ripple Chair excels in modern comfort. Gliding atop nylon casters, its cast-aluminum base supports a generously-scaled seat with polyfoam padding under black bicast leather, creating a soothing ripple effect.

products.name: Humanscale ® Freedom ® Black Office Chair with Headrest
products.content: An office chair that works with you as you're working from home. Created by Humanscale, the black Freedom chair adjusts to you as you move throughout the workday. The unique self-locking reclining mechanism uses your body weight to adjust automatically, leaning up to 20 degrees, and the pivoting backrest tilts as you do

products.name: Humanscale ® Dark Brown Smart Ocean Task Chair
products.content: From ocean to office, this task chair by Humanscale incorporates almost two pounds of recycled fishing net material. Sourced from Net Positiva, a collection and recycling program based in Chile, the nets are transformed into recycled nylon pellets used for manufacturing. A chair with a feel-good story, it also offers a comfortable seat, ergonomically designed for a comfortable sit with form-sensing mesh technology that adjusts instantly to each use.

products.name: Haworth ® Black Fern ™ High Back Desk Chair
products.content: Inspired by the fluid strength and beauty of nature, the Fern task chair provides new levels of balance, flexibility, and performance. Designed much like the human body's spinal anatomy, Fern's responsive motion flows from a centralized stem, enhancing the sitting experience by providing the ability to move with natural freedom, comfort, and total support.

products.name: Imogen Grey Upholstered Office Chair with Casters
products.content: Settle into the living room-style embrace of our Imogen office chair designed for workday comfort. Upholstered in a velvety-soft fabric in decor-friendly light grey, the chair sits comfy and deep with open arms and plush cushions. A chrome-plated star base streamlines the look and rolls from desk to file cabinet on caster wheels. The Imogen office chair is a Crate & Barrel exclusive.

products.name: Veneto Modern Green Swivel Office Chair
products.content: The classic mid-century modern shell chair remains a classic for its sleek minimalism. Our Veneto office chair wraps its molded seat with slubby linen-like fabric in greyish green with clean seams and double top-stitching to keep the look neat and sculptural.

products.name: Pollie White Snow Boucle Nursery Rocking Chair
products.content: You're going to want to sit down for this. With its fine tailoring and soft, sculptural curves, our fashion-forward Pollie rocking chair is a nursery accent that definitely doesn't skimp on style or comfort. We borrowed inspo from European design before adding our signature blend of welcoming charm and unexpected details

products.name: Pelle Leather Reclining Chair
products.content: With its classic silhouette and well-tailored leather upholstery, Pella is a recliner that doesn't look like a recliner. The clever design fully conceals the reclining mechanism within a sleek silhouette, allowing the chair to stand off the floor on tapered, ebony-finished wood legs.

products.name: Milo Faux Sherpa Nursery Swivel Glider Chair with Gold Base
products.content: We tried to find the words to describe just how comfortable our Milo glider is. In the end, we just kept landing on 'ridiculously comfortable.' This modern swivel glider was exclusively designed for us by the amazing artisans at Monte Design,

products.name: Rollin' Cream Boucle Nursery Rocking Chair by Leanne Ford
products.content: Rock and roll right into your new fave seat. Designed by Leanne Ford, our Rollin' rocking chair goes boldly where no nursery seating has gone before (at least not that we know of): geometric runners that are fully covered in fabric.

products.name: Walker Metal Outdoor Lounge Chair with Graphite Sunbrella ® Cushions
products.content: Prop an iced drink on Walker's wide arms and sink back into its deep-seated comfort. Replicating the recessed detailing and architectural lines of our indoor Walker collection, the aluminum lounge chair is powdercoated in dark grey to coordinate with boxy graphite cushions covered in weather-resistant Sunbrella fabric.

products.name: Fen Outdoor Lounge Chair
products.content: As cool and coastal as an ocean breeze, Fen brings effortless style to outdoor lounging. Round dowels of natural teak craft the chair's clean-lined frame, highlighted with wirebrushing and a warm ceruse finish. Each frame is hand-wrapped individually by skilled artisans with an outdoor-rated cord that looks and feels like natural rope.

products.name: Paso Natural Teak Wood Outdoor Adirondack Chair
products.content: At ease with angles, Paso updates the classic Adirondack chair with modern lines and bold shapes in a Caribbean-inspired blue. Made of weather-resistant POLYWOOD, a proprietary blend of plastics, including recycled milk jugs and detergent bottles, the chair assumes its relaxed recline with a streamlined double-slat seat and back, plank-style rear legs, broad armrests and flange-accented front legs

products.name: Dune Taupe Swivel Outdoor Lounge Chair with Sunbrella ® Cushions
products.content: Sleek and urban, our Dune lounge collection creates a truly modern 'indoor room' that lives outdoors. The sleek, outdoor-grade stainless steel frame is upholstered in synthetic mesh that resists fading, mold, tearing and stains.

products.name: Alfresco Black Outdoor Lounge Chair
products.content: Casual, stylish and stackable, our Alfresco lounge chair emulates the look of real wood with clean lines and all-weather durability. Finished in sleek black, the armchair sets faux wood slats within a sturdy yet lightweight aluminum frame. Add on a layer of comfort with coordinating cushions, sold separately.

products.name: Greta Scalloped Raffia Floor Lamp
products.content: Rising from a brushed brass base, our mixed-material Greta Scalloped Raffia Floor Lamp brings breezy elegance to the bedroom, nursery or playroom. The scalloped, flower-inspired shade is woven of natural raffia and casts a soft light, making it perfect for everything from homework to storytime.

products.name: Cosmos Gold Metal Kids Floor Lamp
products.content: The three glowing orbs on this unique kids' floor lamp are suspended by a simple metal frame, ready to cast a warm glow in your bedroom, living room or playroom.

products.name: Flo Fluted Violet Kids Floor Lamp
products.content: Whether you're outfitting your nursery or transitioning from toddler to big-kid room, add a touch of sleek, minimalist style in kid-approved color with our Flo Fluted Violet Floor Lamp. The slender metal base in pastel violet is designed to mix and match with any color palette

products.name: Pixi White Metal and Wood Swivel Floor Lamp
products.content: Pixi puts a modern angle on kids' floor lamps. Straight and simple ash wood arms are held in perfect balance above the matching circular base, and the capsule-shaped matter white head swivels left and right so you can illuminate whatever spot needs it most.

products.name: Meryl Arc Brass Floor Lamp with White Shade
products.content: The Meryl floor lamp goes over and above expectations, suspending a clean drum shade over a sofa or sectional. The two-tier shade in white hangs from a brass-finished arced pole. Streaked in grey, the round white marble base adds a classic touch. The retractable stand offers positioning options for illumination right where you need it.

products.name: Flores Floor Lamp with Fluted Shade
products.content: Flores rises from a rounded wooden base to support a fluted shade on a slender burnished brass-finished stand. Folded into countless precise accordion pleats, the white shade shapes an angular cone for a surprising, parasol-like look

products.name: Weave Greige Floor Lamp
products.content: A tall column of woven paper rattan shapes a textured cylinder shade in a lovely neutral shade somewhere between grey and beige. Stunning on its own, the floor lamp puts its tweedy weave on full view when lit. Contemporary with a nod to mid-century design, the lamp elevates the shade on a four-arm wood stand finished in a complementary shade of dark grey.

products.name: Landing Wood Floor Lamp
products.content: Rounded blocks wrapped in creamy oak veneer stack to shape a floor lamp with the look of a traditional handcarved sculpture or modern glass sphere lamp. With its curved corners, the square drum shade softly diffuses the light through ivory linen, while the crisp lines of the square black base provide sharp balance.

products.name: Noon Natural Wicker Table Lamp by Leanne Ford
products.content: Inspired by vintage bird cages, this striking table lamp constructs an airy enclosure of natural wicker. A breezy weave of rattan surrounds the base, rod and an upright socket in a stack of alternating cylinders that plays on traditional lamp shapes. We love how the table lamp's unconventional silhouette jazzes up a side table or credenza and how the open weave casts intriguing shadows night or day.

products.name: Greta Scalloped Raffia Flush Mount Light
products.content: Our mixed-material Greta Scalloped Raffia Floor Flush Mount Light brings breezy elegance to the bedroom, nursery or playroom. The scalloped, flower-inspired shade is woven of natural raffia and casts a soft, soothing glow.

products.name: Birdcage Bamboo and Rattan 25'' Kids Ceiling Light by Leanne Ford
products.content: Easy, breezy and beautiful, our birdcage-inspired pendant light brings to mind floaty, free-spirited vibes. Slender bamboo circles the three-tiered iron frame, washed in a dreamy white hue and artfully fastened in place by woven rattan. A warm, dappled glow peeks through the fixture's open spaces, illuminating rooms both big and small.

products.name: Hoyne 21.5'' Brass Pendant Light
products.content: Sized to impress, the large Hoyne pendant lamp crisscrosses in an open-weave of sculptural geometry. Its iron wire sphere is hand-welded and finished in brass for a warm, artisanal look.

products.name: Maddox Navy Dome Large Pendant Light with Brass Socket
products.content: Our Maddox collection mixes and matches finishes and features, creating the perfect combination for your home. Steel shades in a variety of shapes, sizes and modern hues pair matte exteriors and glossy white interiors that reflect light beautifully, accented by decorative socket caps and ceiling plates in a range of finishes.

products.name: Rainier Black Conical Pendant Light
products.content: Rainier softens the classic conical pendant by finishing a flared shade with a curve of glass to create a teardrop-like silhouette. The high-contrast pairing of the blackened steel fixture with the white milk glass is graphic, and the frosted glass shade softly diffuses light. We love the linear look of multiple pendants hung above a dining table, kitchen island or down a high-ceilinged hallway.

products.name: Arren Brass 3-Light Round Pendant with Round Milk Glass Shades
products.content: Arren suspends a trio of milky-white glass shades from an iron fixture finished in gleaming brass, the pleasingly rounded pendants hanging from a round ceiling plate and adjustable black fabric cords. Boasting clean lines and graceful proportions, the three-light pendant creates a striking cluster of light above a breakfast nook or reading chair

products.name: Maddox White Faceted Large Pendant Light with Brass Socket
products.content: Our Maddox collection mixes and matches finishes and features, creating the perfect combination for your home. Steel shades in a variety of shapes, sizes and modern hues pair matte exteriors and glossy white interiors that reflect light beautifully, accented by decorative socket caps and ceiling plates in a range of finishes. Strikingly simple with bold geometry and brushed brass details, this large faceted pendant light in matte and shiny white boasts origami-like angles. Hang the adjustable-height ceiling light over a kitchen island, reading nook or dining table for a fascinatingly dimensional look and useful illumination.

products.name: Arren Black Chandelier Light with Round Silver Glass Shades
products.content: Arren suspends a sextet of mercury glass-like shades from an iron fixture finished in black. The round silver glass orbs radiate around the center, supported by slender rods that curve gracefully. Boasting clean lines and classic proportions, the six-light chandelier offers a delightful presence—and plenty of light—in an entryway, above a dining table or at the top and bottom of a stairway.

products.name: Arren Brass 5-Light Linear Pendant with Large Round Clear Glass Shades
products.content: Arren suspends a quintet of oversized, bubble-like shades from an iron fixture finished in brass, the clear glass globes hanging from a rectangular ceiling plate and adjustable black fabric cords. Boasting clean lines and graceful proportions, the five-light pendant creates a striking line of light above a long island or table.

products.name: Arren Brass 3-Light Round Pendant with Teardrop Silver Glass Shades
products.content: Arren suspends a trio of silver glass shades from an iron fixture finished in gleaming brass, the bell-shaped pendants hanging from a round ceiling plate and adjustable black fabric cords. Boasting clean lines and graceful proportions, the three-light pendant creates a striking cluster of light above a breakfast nook or reading chair. Designed by Mark Daniel of Slate Design exclusively for us, this pendant is part of our Arren collection of flexible lighting options with a custom feel.

products.name: Lyre Blackened Steel 2-Light Torch Plug In Wall Sconce
products.content: Lyre casts a soft glow on a dining room wall or hallway. The plug-in sconce's fresh take on ambient lighting sets two lamps side by side, each with a petite white linen drum shade on a streamlined blackened steel torch. Alone or in multiples, our exclusive Lyre two-light sconce instantly refreshes your decor.

products.name: Single Kids Wall Mounted Adjustable Light
products.content: Our adjustable wall light is easy to mount and features a swing arm that allows it to smoothly move from side to side. That means you can always have light nearby, no matter how you feel like lounging. Our plug-in sconce is a Crate & Kids exclusive.

products.name: Esphera Grey Round Table Lamp
products.content: Bold geometry, natural materials. For our Esphera round table lamp, a terracotta sphere finished in dark grey provides the perfect counterpart to a bright white cylindrical jute shade. The finely finished drum filters light beautifully and contrasts intriguingly with the textured base. A Crate and Barrel exclusive, the grey lamp brings welcome illumination and modern organic style to a side table, nightstand or desk.

products.name: Onada Mini Curved Wood Table Lamp
products.content: Introduce a bit of movement to your side table with our Onada table lamp. Made of curly maple wood veneer, the lamp's square base swerves with unexpected curves. A rounded rectangle of off-white linen tops off as a light-diffusing shade. A great way to enliven and illuminate your space, the Onada wood table lamp is a Crate & Barrel exclusive.

products.name: Neve Sculptural Table Lamp
products.content: A sculpture that illuminates itself. Inspired by fine art, our table lamp curves an imperfect oval while a pour of reactive glazes in blue and grey adds a sense of fluid motion. An off-white linen drum shade filters light, casting the sculptural table lamp in a glow that highlights its curves. Our exclusive Neve lamp makes a statement on end tables, nightstands and desks.

products.name: Humanscale ® Horizon Silver Desk Lamp
products.content: Suitable for home or office, this visually striking desk lamp available in six eye-catching colors produces an even, glare-free plane of warm white illumination, casting just one shadow. Made by Humanscale, the lamp is powered by Thin Film LED technology, the intuitively dimming from full brightness to nightlight, and is engineered with precision-brass ball joints for effortless adjustment. This beautifully designed lamp received a Red Dot Award and the Next Generation Luminaires Award for product design and performance.

products.name: Lumi Pets Bunny Night Light
products.content: The LumiPets Bunny Night Light is an adorable, nursery-ready night light that's also amazingly functional. This baby-friendly night light casts a soothing, tranquil glow. It's made from non-toxic silicone, so it's chew-safe and soft to the touch. Tap it to change the color (there's eight to choose from), and charge it using the convenient USB port. Plus, there's a remote that makes it easy to control brightness and set the sleep timer.

banner-img.heading: MEN'S SHIRTS
banner-img.details: Style Fusion shirts are world-famous for more than one reason: quality, perfect fit, and options. Choose from work shirts that dress you for meetings, tuxedo shirts for those special occasions, linen shirts for those easy days, and more. Order them your way; collar, cuff, size, fit, and style.

banner-img.heading: Chair'S IN FURNITURE
banner-img.details: Crate & Barrel chairs are a delightful fusion of artistry and functionality, setting new standards for seating excellence. Whether you're looking for accent chairs, dining chairs, or loungers, Crate & Barrel offers an exquisite selection that caters to diverse tastes and interior design preferences.

banner-img.heading: Tables'S IN FURNITURE
banner-img.details: Crate & Barrel tables are a testament to the marriage of form and function, combining practicality with exquisite design. Crafted with an unwavering attention to detail, these tables become the centerpiece of any room, adding both style and functionality to your living spaces.

banner-img.heading: Crate&Barrel: Elevate Your Home with Stunning Decor and Pillows
banner-img.details: Crate&Barrel's decor and pillows collection is a celebration of creativity and style, offering a curated selection of exquisite pieces that effortlessly enhance the beauty of your living spaces. From eye-catching accents to cozy cushions, their offerings cater to every design aesthetic, allowing you to infuse your home with warmth, personality, and sophistication.
